mapper.insert: insert into t_order_details (id, order_id, goods_name, goods_num, unit, price, sum, is_valid, create_date, update_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=REAL}, #{sum,jdbcType=REAL}, #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_order_details set order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_num = #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=REAL}, sum = #{sum,jdbcType=REAL}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, order_id, goods_name, goods_num, unit, price, sum, is_valid, create_date, update_date from t_order_details where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, order_id, goods_name, goods_num, unit, price, sum, is_valid, create_date, update_date from t_order_details
select id, order_id, goods_name, goods_num, unit, price, sum, is_valid, create_date, update_date from t_order_details where order_id = #{orderId}
